author: Louis Rossmann
description:
https://forums.macrumors.com/threads/owc-ssd-upgrade-2012-macbook-air-buyer-beware.1459847/page-11?post=20525711#post-20525711

I used to defend OWC when people crapped on them 11 years ago. When I started getting flurries of machines into my store where the drives were taped into the machine as the screw hole in the machine did not line up with the drive, I should've learned my lesson. 

I did not :(
title: OWC mercury pro review:  junk....
